1.title: Enhanced Monitoring for purchase_value
1.insight: SHAP analysis shows purchase_value is the strongest fraud driver (mean |SHAP|: 0.2533)
1.recommendation: Implement real-time monitoring for transactions where purchase_value exceeds 0.75. These transactions should trigger additional verification steps.
1.implementation: Create alert rule: IF purchase_value > 0.75 THEN require additional verification (2FA, manual review)
1.business_impact: Reduces false negatives by catching high-risk transactions early, while maintaining customer experience for low-risk cases

2.title: Reduce False Positives for purchase_value
2.insight: False positive analysis shows purchase_value contributes 1.6128 SHAP value to incorrect fraud flags
2.recommendation: For transactions with purchase_value in the range that causes false positives, implement a secondary check before flagging as fraud. Consider whitelisting known good patterns.
2.implementation: Create rule: IF purchase_value in [specific range] AND account_age > 30 days THEN reduce fraud score by 0.2
2.business_impact: Improves customer experience by reducing false positives while maintaining fraud detection capability

3.title: Strengthen Detection for browser_Safari Pattern
3.insight: False negative analysis reveals browser_Safari has high value (1.00) but low SHAP impact (-0.0728), indicating model may not be capturing this pattern effectively
3.recommendation: Implement a business rule to flag transactions where browser_Safari exceeds 1.00 as high-risk, regardless of model prediction. Consider retraining with additional features that capture this pattern.
3.implementation: Create rule: IF browser_Safari > 1.00 THEN set minimum fraud score to 0.6 (override model if lower)
3.business_impact: Reduces financial loss by catching fraud patterns the model may miss, especially for edge cases

4.title: Monitor purchase_value and age Interaction
4.insight: SHAP analysis identifies purchase_value and age as the top two fraud drivers. Their interaction may be critical for fraud detection.
4.recommendation: Create a combined risk score that considers both purchase_value and age together. Transactions with both features in high-risk ranges should be flagged immediately.
4.implementation: Create composite rule: IF (purchase_value > threshold1 AND age > threshold2) THEN flag as high-risk fraud
4.business_impact: Improves detection accuracy by leveraging feature interactions that the model has learned
